Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Requires a mental health medical professional to examine inmates in solitary confinement
Summary: Requires a mental health medical professional to examine inmates in solitary confinement when such inmate is in such confinement for a period in excess of twenty-four hours.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to requiring a mental health medical professional to examine inmates in solitary confinement
